ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: /assist problem
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL!  Perhaps you should adjust that slightly to read: Darkfox looks for something to bonk, sees a tank standing around /bonk tank But seriously, that s not
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! Perhaps you should adjust that slightly to read:

"Darkfox looks for something to bonk, sees a tank standing around"
/bonk tank

But seriously, that's not a bad idea. I may add an emote to my assist
key. Something along the lines of:

Evulia closes her eyes, belts out a few tunes, and slashes wildly at
%target

With any luck, even if I miss the emote, one of my group mates might notice
if I'm slashing wildly at our puller, especially if I hit it before the
pullers gotten back to the group.

Peace
Evulia




blitz_krieg@b
igfoot.com To: eqbards@egroups.com
cc:
10/13/2000 Subject: [eqbards] Re:
12:07 PM /assist problem
Please
respond to
eqbards






I find that if my Target is clear and once the /assisted tank starts
to fight, I don't get bugged too often. If I have something already
targeted (whether player or mob), I get bugged alot. It's easy for
me to keep my Target clear, but unfortunately, it's hard for my
group. :/ Is there a command to clear your Target? It'd be nice to
toss that into the /assist hotkey. Also, if I /assist too early
(before the tank hits autoattack), I usually get something targeted
that's halfway across the zone. It's strange.

I've run into the same cranky Enchanters, heh... I know it must get
frustrating on a very large raid because there's so many people who
can possibly make a mistake, but they do need to understand
that /assist doesn't work 100%. They need to play a Melee class to
see how it works before screaming at everyone.

ALSO, my biggest complaint is when the main tank goes AFK or is busy
doing something!!! Nothing is more annoying than hearing someone
chew out the whole raid about using assist properly, when the freakin
tank can't do his job! I've started adding a /bonk or /bleed to
my /assist hotkey, so I'll bonk or bleed on the target, or on nothing
REPEATEDLY if the tanks not doing his job. And I mean repeatedly.
<eg>

Darkfox looks for something to bonk!

Darkfox bonks uber_mob_who_drops_phat_lewt00 on the head!

Gratz on 50, Slyde!

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Finally closing in on 53 on Xegony
